welcome:
Welcome to Levi Aviv's Portfolio Website!
Below is a list of commands to help you navigate my website:

commands.name: socials
commands.description: Displays links to GitHub, LinkedIn, LeetCode, and DevPost

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Prints my resume out to the console

commands.name: clear
commands.description: Removes all output from the terminal

skills: Proficiency in Python with 6 years of developing microservices, scripts, and websites
Experienced in DevOps development with Docker, Jenkins, Groovy, GitHub Actions, and Terraform
2-years of experience in C developing applications, games and embedded applications
Experienced in Windows, Linux, and MacOS development environments
Proficient in using Git version control

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Ported existing CI systems from CircleCI to GitHub Actions, improved existing CI systems, and wrote new client onboarding workflows to provision AWS resources through Terraform.
Refactored existing NodeJS service from legacy JS to ES6 and improved testability and maintainability

experience.title: SDE Intern
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a modular service independent API response parser in Java enabling rapid adoption of new services with minimal new code
Extended an internal tax testing tool to support new transaction types, extending use-case coverage by 25%
Developed a dynamic frontend for the internal tax testing tool using JS and JSP
Deprecated 6000+ lines of legacy code, replacing with code following modern best practices and 100%c unit-test coverage

experience.title: DevOps Consultant
responsibilities: Independently designed and implemented CI/CD infrastructure automating the build, testing, and deployment process of Java and Python projects using Python, Groovy, and Jenkins
Gathered requirements from the customer and created formal specification documentation to be used in the design process

experience.title: Instructional Assistant
responsibilities: Assisted in leading Introductory to Computer Programming lab with 30 students
Graded students and provided support and instruction in competing programming tasks in lab

experience.title: Build Engineer
responsibilities: Designed a general API system for extending the CI system through plugins using Python and RabbitMQ
Created Continuous Integration infrastructure using Jenkins, Groovy and Python
Optimized existing CI systems, reducing build time from 2 hours per build to under 45 minutes
Wrote systems tests for Continuous Integration platform to ensure new builds have no regression

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Improved TensorFlow machine learning model accuracy by 10%
Developed web app to visualize machine learning data using JavaScript and D3.js
Overhauled entire data flow system of program and enabled multithreading on several processes
Set up AWS and Google Cloud VM Instances
